root: ^ME: I think this is the Nitrogen! But how do I make sure..

c-0: ^ ME: Whatever, it is the only green thing around. I'll just take it.
c-1: ^ ME: Let's take a little whiff, just to be sure...
^ME: Damn - that smells worse than my morning breath.
c-2: ^ ME: I need to be sure this is the right stuff. Here goes...
^ME: Why did I even think of tasting fertilizer?
^ME: Sometimes I wonder how I ever got my PhD.
c-3: ^ ME: Meh, this won't be it.
